name: Deeper Underground
description:
All aspects of Human life were radically changed during the 21st century with the discovery of a previously unknown element, Anomalous Material #1841-4.

Due to its unique properties, it can be used as a near limitless power source with its uncanny ability to amplify thermal energies applied to it.

Capitalising on their discovery, The Aurora Corporation quickly began their rise to prominence, dominating every market they entered, eventually culminating in the formation of the United Earth Coalition.

You are an engineer aboard the Deep-Sea Aquatic Research Habitat #25.

At approximately 0300 hours, a station wide lockdown was put into effect.

All staff are to report to the surface and await further instructions.
